column4: Yeah, but if you try to install a theme, you shouldn't need them. Or... Do you?
some themes use particular gtk engines, so yes depending on the theme
this one for example: http://www.gnome-look.org/content/show.php?content=34779 It won't work, however I do have Clearlooks installed.
that one should probably work because, like you said, it is using clearlooks.  What exactly happens?
